channel.title: How to stop mass clicking

item.title: How to stop mass clicking
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

i made an interface that when you click you get items then it closes, how do i stop mass clicking?

Please help
code:

case 74108: if(c.getItems().freeSlots() <= 1) { c.sendMessage("You need atleast 1 free slot's to use this feature."); } else { c.getPA().closeAllWindows(); c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().Reward(), 1); c.sendMessage("You Receive Your Misc Items"); } break;

Read full topic
